pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Regression Models with Global-Local Shrinkage Priors // Fits linear or logistic regression model using Bayesian global- local shrinkage prior hierarchies as described in Polson and Scott (2010) doi:10.1093/acprof:oso/9780199694587.003.0017. Handles ridge, lasso, horseshoe and horseshoe+ regression with logistic, Gaussian, Laplace or Student-t distributed targets using the algorithms summarized in Makalic and Schmidt (2016) arXiv:1611.06649.
